fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - View someone at night or use an ability you have seen.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- Whenever you view someone, you will receive all feedback they did. You may choose 1 feedback message they received, and you will gain the ability that caused that feedback message to be produced.
- You may view and use one other ability per night.

fields.name: Goal:
fields.value: Have the good faction lose the game (this can win while dead).
